title: El Tigre Braum
body: I was playing braum and i really liked him, so i bought the el tigre skin, the next time i played i used the skin and there wasn't any voice in his dance, taunt, laugh movements, or jokes. I played another game afterwards and there still aren't any voices. I went into a custom game and no voices on el tigre but there are voices on standard braum

replies.body:
I care!!

This unfortunate bug is on its way to being fixed. Thanks for the report!
your fixing a sound issue before the q knockup on Xin.. rude :P

{{champion:201}}  was playing normals last night in favorite El Tigre costume, but found he could not speak! Someone must have done {{champion:201}}'s laundry on too high heat; the spandex....it was too tight! {{champion:201}} could barely fit, let alone speak with normal voice!

This makes {{champion:201}}  sad; how can he cheer friends up and on without voice to tell them {{champion:201}} is here for them? Please...use low heat next time, or let me do own clothes washing!
I was on the PBE server and same bug. It just hasn't been noticed yet. Someone forgot a bit of coding xD
your not alone in this have the skin too no sound either.
